title: Multiclass Matthew's Correlation Coefficient
description: An explanation of how the rather opaque vectorized implementations of Multiclass Matthew's Correlation Coefficient found in popular open-source, machine learning libraries work.

title: Numerically Stable Softmax
description: An explanation of the math behind the trick of subtracting the max value from the logits to calculate the softmax in a numerically stable way.

title: Hot-swapping a Wacom Tablet on Linux
description: There is a strong community supporting Wacom drawing tablets with easy to install drivers and software to help configure the tablet. One thing that is lacking is support for re-configuration when you unplug the tablet and plug it back in. In this post we dive into my solution.

title: Entropy and the Uniform Distribution
description: Common entropy calculations have special forms when applied to the Uniform distribution.
